levelPage.level2Conditions: Directly invite 10 people to activate Coinbase robot (minimum $100) or higher, including 2 Level 1 Brokers in the team, with total team performance exceeding 5,000 USDT (Total: 20 members)

levelPage.level3Conditions: Directly invite 20 people to activate Coinbase robot (minimum $100) or higher, including 2 Level 2 Brokers in the team, with total team performance exceeding 20,000 USDT (Total: 60 members)
levelPage.level3Salary: Daily dividend: 60 USDT, Monthly income: 1,800 USDT, Daily flash exchange: 3 WLD
levelPage.level4Conditions: Directly invite 30 people to activate Coinbase robot (minimum $100) or higher, including 2 Level 3 Brokers in the team, with total team performance exceeding 80,000 USDT (Total: 150 members)

levelPage.level5Conditions: Directly invite 50 people to activate Coinbase robot (minimum $100) or higher, including 2 Level 4 Brokers in the team, with total team performance exceeding 200,000 USDT (Total: 350 members)

levelPage.noteContent: Upon upgrading to Level 1 Broker, you'll receive daily rewards of 5 USDT and monthly income of 150 USDT. Exchange 1 WLD daily. Directly grow your team. If team total does not meet upgrade requirements, you will be automatically downgraded. Higher team levels allow more WLD to be exchanged.

captionPage.faq1Title: How does Vitu Finance work to gain income?
captionPage.faq1Content: The working principle of Vitu Finance is to use quantitative robots to conduct quantitative robot transactions on Binance coinbase or major cryptocurrency exchanges, and automatically access the API to the exchange, Using AI technology to continuously change strategies and update data, the robot continuously detects market conditions and earns the price difference through high-frequency trading, thereby obtaining benefits. Join us to explore the frontier of artificial intelligence!
captionPage.faq2Title: There are two types of AI trend quantification robots
captionPage.faq2Content1: Vitu Finance's AI trend quantification robot adopts a high-frequency grid quantification strategy, aiming to reduce risks while maximizing returns. It monitors hundreds of trading pairs on CEX and DEX, automatically optimizes trading strategies through deep learning and big data analysis, and achieves automatic profits.
captionPage.faq2CexContent:
thereby obtaining benefits. Join us to explore the frontier of artificial intelligence!
CEX-Robots is a robot that connects to centralized exchanges through API. Binance coinbase is a centralized exchange. After activating the robot, you can get stable income every day. The deposit for activating the robot will be returned to your account when it expires.
captionPage.faq2DexContent: DEX-Robots is a robot for decentralized exchanges. PancakeSwap Uniswap is a decentralized exchange. After activating the robot, you need to complete work every day. After the salary and deposit expire, they will be paid to your account together. The yield is higher than CEX-Robots.
captionPage.faq3Title: How to quickly participate in Vitu Finance?
captionPage.faq3Step1: 1. Register a DAPP account through the platform invitation link in the crypto wallet browser
captionPage.faq3Step2: 2. Select the type of quantitative robot you want to participate in and start the robot
captionPage.faq3Step3: 3. Complete the trading orders of quantitative robots every day to earn arbitrage profits
captionPage.faq3Step4: 4. Promote team members to participate to obtain generous promotion rewards and team income
captionPage.faq4Title: How to start the Vitu Finance robot to earn daily income?
captionPage.faq4Step1: 1. Select the type of robot you want on the "Robot" page, and then click the "Start" button
captionPage.faq4Step2: 2. On the "My Robot" page, click the "Start Quantification" button to complete today's arbitrage order
captionPage.faq4Step3: 3. Wait for tens of seconds to complete the quantitative task and get today's profit
captionPage.faq4Note1: -Update the day's robot orders after 00:00 (UTC) every day, without waiting for 24 hours
captionPage.faq4Note2: -You must manually click "Start Quantification" every day to complete the order task to get the day's quantitative income
captionPage.faq5Title: Why do I need to pay a deposit to start a robot to work?
captionPage.faq5Content1: Because we have signed effective quantitative orders with major exchanges and third-party institutions, we allocate orders to members who activate robots for daily arbitrage.
captionPage.faq5Content2: If anyone participates in the work and quits without paying the deposit, or if the robot is activated but fails to create benefits, causing it to be abandoned, not only will our cost of building the robot be voided, but we will also pay a large amount of liquidated damages to other companies.
captionPage.faq6Title: The robot can achieve 2%-3%/day income. Will production be reduced in the future?
captionPage.faq6Content1: At present, the latest Vitu Finance robot's average income can reach 3%/day. Because our exclusive super quantum robot is continuously optimized, upgraded and iterated through the quantitative behavior generated by global users using Vitu Finance generative pre-training conversion, it has broken the monopoly on core technology.
captionPage.faq6Content2: In fact, in the field of crypto, the quantified income of top companies can already increase the annualized income to dozens of times. However, because the technical threshold is too high and has an excessive impact on the local gap between rich and poor, it has never been made available to individual users or announced to the outside world.
captionPage.faq6Content3: The birth of Vitu Finance is to break the industrial technology monopoly, so that all ordinary people can participate in quantification with one click through AI artificial intelligence and enjoy the early dividends of the industry.
captionPage.faq6Content4: As the threshold of quantitative technology decreases and the industry becomes more common, the profit sources and risk-return rates of quantitative returns will decrease, and the benefits generated will naturally decrease. Revenue from newly launched robots may decline in the future.

signatureAuthPopup.title: Wallet Signature Authentication
signatureAuthPopup.blockingDesc: To protect your assets, please complete wallet signature authentication first
signatureAuthPopup.signNote: This signature is only used to verify wallet ownership and will not transfer any assets.
signatureAuthPopup.biometricDesc:
For a more convenient signing experience, we recommend enabling face recognition or fingerprint in your TokenPocket wallet.

Path: TokenPocket → Settings → Security → Biometric
